name: Huba Ferencz
about: I'm a Web developer with a passion for turning cool ideas into amazing web apps. I love the process of designing, developing, testing, and deploying projects that make a real difference in people's lives. Whether it's for my clients or for myself, I always strive to create web apps that are not only functional but also user-friendly and visually appealing. I believe that a good web app should be easy to use, convey a company's message effectively, and bring out their unique identity.
